Title: Fields Afire
Writer: Terri Spaugh (screenplay), Shannon Jimenez, Terri Spaugh (story)
Actors: Kyle Cody, Britton Stoeckel, Madeleine Ausburn, Philip Clement
Plot: A team of misfit kids playing at a baseball park are caught in a meteorite strike that burns the fields, leaving them unharmed but believing they are endowed with special powers.
